markdownRemark.html: Set in an old Avocado plantation, there is a good mix of mature trees, fruit bushes and a fair amount of water on this golf course. There is wide fairways, beautifully manicured greens and golf is played at a pace which is neither too fast nor too slow. Buggies are allowed on the fairway and a refreshment buggy also drives around the course. Great small clubhouse with very friendly staff for a meal afterwards.

frontmatter.title: Santana Golf and Country Club

Buggies are allowed on the fairway and a refreshment buggy also drives around the course. Great small clubhouse with very friendly staff for a meal afterwards.
frontmatter.address: Ctra. La Cala - Entrerríos s/n, Va 29649 Mijas Costa, Málaga, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 80.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 80.00 euros
tags: Top golf courses Costa del Sol
